name: Emoji Pong
description:
The classic "Pong" returns with a fresh twist for the modern age! Challenge the computer to a frantic duel, bouncing a slew of emoji back & forth until one emerges victorious.

More challenges, game modes, and even multiplayer support will be coming soon, so stay tuned!

Concept by Matthew Britton
Music by RoccoW and Eric Skiff
Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne
